full_summary:
# RFP GIS Hosting and Development {#rfp-gis-hosting-and-development}
==========================================================

### Tender Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4413300047
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4413300047
* **Date Published**: 2024-04-04
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-10T14:00:00

### Tender Description

Procurement ID: WS4413300047

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Atlantic Real Property Branch is seeking a qualified contractor to provide Geography Information System (GIS) web hosting and development services.

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

* **RFP ID**: WS4413300047
* **RFP Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Notice Type**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Trade Agreements**: Participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), among others.
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-06-01
* **Duration**: One year with four twelve-month option periods.

### Contracting Entity

* **Department**: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
* **Contact Details**:
  * **Name**: MacNeil, Blaine
  * **Email**: [blaine.macneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:blaine.macneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### RFP Documents

* **RFP URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19310151?extsite=MTkzMTAxNTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please review the RFP documents carefully before submitting your proposal. Only one proposal will be accepted. Submission deadline: 2024-05-10T14:00:00. 

I reformatted the contractor's entry into nice markdown format, removed all unnecessary information and included only the relevant details, and rephrased the text to make it more clear and concise.
